segments.text: I see the little girl standing there, looking so hopeful.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her hand is outstretched, waiting for a cookie from her brother.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a bit sad for her, wanting something so simple.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She seems to trust her brother completely to get her a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice how carefully she is standing, not touching the stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She must know they could get into trouble if their mother catches them.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think she is trying to be as quiet as possible.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her eyes are fixed on the cookie jar, not on her brother's unstable position.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a sense of longing, remembering my own childhood.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She looks so innocent and sweet, standing there.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope she gets her cookie without any accidents happening.
segments.speaker: PAR
